document_data.name: House Teken'duis
document_data.mainbody: '''House Teken'duis''' was formerly a noble [[drow]] house in the district of [[West Wall]] in [[Menzoberranzan]].
document_data.Headquarters: House Teken'duis resided in a two-stalagmite compound in the northwest part of the city in West Wall.
document_data.History:
House Teken'duis was the seventeenth house in [[1297 DR]]. After the elimination of [[House DeVir]], it became the sixteenth house.

In [[1319 DR]],

The ruined manor remained abandoned in West Wall.
